title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)) and section 59(2) of the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Admissions
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Admissions 

and Appointments) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited garda siochana (admissions appointments) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)) and section 59(2) of the
heading: 2. The Garda Síochána (Admissions and Appointments) Regulations 2013
text_raw:
2. The Garda Síochána (Admissions and Appointments) Regulations 2013 
(S.I. No. 470 of 2013) are amended in paragraph (a) of Regulation 4 by the 
substitution of “50” for “35”. 

The Government hereby approve of the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Taoiseach, 

5 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 December, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [611] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
